website_summaries.verdict: This cute little gumball machine is perfect for a countertop treat dispenser, plus it has a durable build that makes it a sound investment.
pros: The globe is a shatter resistant polycarbonate
Cash box is included for easy coin collection
Made from an all-metal construction for long-lasting use
cons: A higher price point than other models

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as expected. No instructions however, seller has resolved issue.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gumball machine as a fun way for the kids to save money for college. The key function worked great and The materials feel sturdy. The machine did not come with instructions. I had a difficult time switching the plate to allow for 1 inch gumballs and reassembling. The machine looks nice but did not function correctly. When full it only gives a gumball for every 4 or 5 quarters put in. Overall my kids are disappointed as it does not always give them gumballs. UPDATE: Seller was very kind and resolved all issues and I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: smasma

customer_reviews.title: Good Product But Difficult Assembly - REVISED
customer_reviews.text: My husband took the gumball machine apart to fill it. It was very difficult to reassemble without instructions. This products comes without instructions. After about an hour, he figured it out. Now that it's back together it works well. The Seller was very kind to read my review and provide a video of the instructions. This is very helpful. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Keener

customer_reviews.title: Adjust for gumball size! Check YouTube Video
customer_reviews.text: Had to adjust gumball roller to 1 inch size didn’t learn this until after I loaded it with gumballs! Easy fix just open gear that gumballs sit on ( lift & turn)to widest setting for 1 inch size!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Machine has many flaws
customer_reviews.text: This machine works for a few times then crushes gum balls. If it dispenses gumboils correctly then it stops taking quarters. Customer service was not helpful in resolving the problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Willson

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, built to last. Fun and a good place to put your change.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Nice gum ball machine
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with the first one. The seller sent a new one. Works perfect. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Derrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. We are using for the children in our business office.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: I'll be looking for a better one.
customer_reviews.text: This gumball machine worked one day before now not giving a gunball anymore. Key is stuck in the top and won't come out. I'll be looking for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: DESIREE W

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, Well Made but Requires Lots of Quarters
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the security and stability of a gum ball dispenser that could be set on a bookshelf vs the floor stand version which had been knocked over and broken. The previous dispenser could be disabled from requiring coins but this one cannot be overridden. So....I have to have plenty of quarters available.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn J.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because even when we buy snacks and candy from the store the kids still take their money and buy more. I have always wanted a gumball machine as a kid and this one was a good price so I said why not. Everybody in the house including my wife hates it but the first day I already made over $5 from it lol. I will use their combined change to buy myself new gun parts. Merica... lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy- easy to set up- very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, my 16 yr old son wanted this so he could make money off his siblings when they wanted candy lol... he easily adjusted it to give the amount of candy he wanted- sturdy- attractive- exactly what he wanted!! So glad since it was from Santa!!
customer_reviews.author: Preston Dollar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: Took quite awhile to get to work as it should. Took whole thing apart and took out some parts and now it sorta works. Wouldn't buy again. Wanted it to work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A. Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more money and get something better
customer_reviews.text: It comes with no instructions. It keeps smashing up the gum balls. It says you can put the little plastic toy holders in it doesn't work they get stuck. It looks nice but I'm sure there is better ones
customer_reviews.author: lillian dominguez

customer_reviews.title: No instructions but easy to figure out
customer_reviews.text: It came with no instructions but you only need to actually take it apart to change the size of the little dispenser wheel (what size ball/ gum ball you’re dispensing.) it’s easy to disassemble and out back together. You can even google how to change the size of the dispenser wheel in this type of machine.
customer_reviews.author: RaeLynn Zaksek

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size does not take 1 inch gumballs
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 inch gumballs and this says 1 inch gumballs on the description but they don't fit. Now i have and paid for two big bags of 1 inch gumballs i can't return and don't have a machine for
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Gum ball machine
customer_reviews.text: Looks works great. It was shipped fast and is nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fayhee

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The description they provide is accurate. The kids and I love it! It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: great machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine worked beautifully. I just wish it had written instructions on adjustments with it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Bruneau

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it is picky about quarters!
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying this gumball machine. It was easy to put together and looks nice in our kitchen. The only problem is that National Parks quarters and some State quarters don’t work in the machine! We got a roll of quarters and 1/3rd of them didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A substantial machine
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap, flimsy machine. It is sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hair

customer_reviews.title: Needs BIGGER candies
customer_reviews.text: Realized after a few uses that larger candies need to fill this candy machine. Like gum balls or mike and Ikes. Skittle and m/ms come out so quickly the profit is super small... Just something to consider!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ❤ it my son loves it also got it for em Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer keener

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is expense junk: had for less than 3 months and it has stopped working. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: bought for a gift for my Grandson. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Thurmond H.

customer_reviews.title: Could be more reliable for the money
customer_reviews.text: Gumballs keep getting stuck in machine. Everything else is fine
customer_reviews.author: Doug Heffernan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to take apart and adjust the size of the prize return.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Herting

customer_reviews.title: The wrong thing came
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a different item came in the mail
customer_reviews.author: Seth Bednarz

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: I can’t open it with the key. It usually takes a really long time
customer_reviews.author: Anna Joh

customer_reviews.title: Great gumball machine, kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: This gumball machine is sturdy and durable. It looks very authentic. Quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: T.Harris

product_meta.title: Mophorn Gumball Machine Durable Metal Body Gumball Dispenser Machine with Key Lock Big Gumball Machine Red Style Candy Vending Machine Perfect for Home Use, Gaming Stores
product_meta.description:
Candy Vending Machine Dispenser

 Superior candy gumball machine available for 375 gumballs, bouncy balls or 1" round capsules, 10 lbs of candy for each tank. With the interchangeable pod system, it is quite quick and easy to refill.



 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 

key Features

 Sufficient Capacity

 Candy vending machine with a capacity of about 375 1" gumballs/capsules or 10 lb candies in the single tank.

 Assuring Quality

 Premium construction with cast metal base, lid and coin mechanism. Polycarbonate tank, will not rust or crack.

 Convenient Access

 Rotary knob provides easy access simply by spinning it for 180 degrees. One 25-cent coin is needed for every transaction. 


 Thoughtful Protection

 A small lid is attached over the outlet to prevent purchased products from accidentally dropping down onto the floor.

 Effortless Maintenance

 Top lid cam locks for security. Opens conveniently when necessary for easy replenishment and repairment. 


 Adjustable Wheel

 Adjustable candy wheels control quantity of pieces to vend. You can change the size of the window to deliver the candy.

Specifications


 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 
 * 

Package Content
 * 
 * 
 *
feature_bullets: 【LARGE CAPACITY】- Available for 375 gumballs, bouncy balls or 1" round capsules, 10 lbs of candy to make more profit.
【ADVANCED QUALITY】- Constructed with aluminium, cast metal and transparent polycarbonate. Machine Size (approx.): 15.5" x 6.5" (394 x 165 mm).

【CONVENIENT USAGE】-Coin adaption: 25-cent coin required for transaction, one coin at a time. Spin 180 degrees and you'll be able to receive what you've expected. Adjustable candy wheels control quantity of pieces to vend.
【THOUGHTFUL DESIGN】- Over the outlet there is a small lid to prevent purchased item from falling. Barrel lock on top for security.

【WIDE APPLICATION】-This machine is designed to sell candies, bouncy balls, small capsule toys, etc. Perfect for home use, gaming stores, etail stores, restaurants, canteens, bars, amusement parks, shopping arcades, etc.
